snippet: Eli Manning no doubt provides more consistency than anyone Washington has to offer, but the Redskins’ triumvirate has outperformed Manning, a two-time Super Bowl winner.
lead_paragraph: Eli Manning no doubt provides more consistency than anyone Washington has to offer, but the Redskins’ triumvirate has outperformed Manning, a two-time Super Bowl winner.

headline.main: Washington Redskins at New York Giants Preview
